name: Impending Doom
description: You target a creature within a moderate (20 unit) range and fill them with a sense of impending doom. While you concentrate on this spell, your target takes multiplying psychic damage at the start of each turn. The damage starts at 2 and increases by 2 each round up to a maximum of 16 at which point the spell ends, unless the creature has the afraid condition.
charge: The damage starts at 6 and ends at 20. The type of skull used as a component must be of the same creature type as the target.
